thread.title: Excellent service and nice touch for St.Patricks day
thread.title_full: Excellent service and nice touch for St.Patricks day - Review of Mercure London Bridge, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Hixxy76
title: Excellent service and nice touch for St.Patricks day
text:
Excellent check-in as checked in on line - my keys and welcome enveople were ready - in a classy new style folder for accor members - as a gold member upgraded to a priviledge room which was nice ..
Excellent surprise and delight moment when housekeeping arroived with a Kilner Glass and can of cold guiness to celebrate St.Patricks day .... really was well recieved !
Speedy checkout by the same guy that checked me in ( Edwardo ?? ) who really was good ... will come back and recommned for sure
